reviewText: Very informative and educational. I would recommend to anyone interested in American history.

This series is factual, yet fascinating. Hearing the interviews interwoven into the history and philosophy of each time period really brings this series to life. Very interesting for those interested in world cultures and history.

I originally purchased the DVD but gave it to my son. I ended up buying the tapes for myself because of the price difference. Now I wish that I had purchased the DVD instead because the VCR's are being phased out. I didn't realize that the series were on 4 separate tapes, taking up more room on my shelves than one DVD...duh! I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the bulkiness of 4 tapes when they could have put the series all on one. The content is amazing!
